extendedInfo.description: Want to surprise your friends with general knowledge of the world? Want to Impresswith fun facts to all people? Want to increase your general knowledge?Did you know? Is an application that will display daily different curious phrases that will surprise you. Keep you updated with the world and will also mark the intellectual difference between you and your friends.Note: We are not responsible for the accuracy of the information shown in theapplication. All information is taken from the Internet.

reviews.title: Get an editor
reviews.comment: So many spelling and grammar mistakes, it was driving me crazy . I had to take a few to decipher what the statement was trying to say.
reviews.author: Hafsa Saeed

reviews.title: This app is garbage
reviews.comment: This app is a waste of time the facts are wrong. For instance the microwave was invented by a man who found a melted chocolate bar in his shirt pocket while trying to invent the vaccuum
reviews.author: Devante Dudley

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: I have done my research and have found that most Is very true. Like the man who invented the microwave. It was an accident because of a melting chocolate bar. :)
reviews.author: Tiff C.

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Some interesting facts, unsure if they\'re accurate though. Contains typos, need to change them.
reviews.author: Ellin Anegkana

reviews.title: Do not download!
reviews.comment: All it has is the same things all over again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Share
reviews.comment: Share doesn\'t work to Facebook. Galaxy 3
reviews.author: Josh Strube
